text: George Gascón (born March 12, 1953) is an American attorney and former police officer. He has been the district attorney of Los Angeles County since 2020. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Gascón was the district attorney of San Francisco from 2011 to 2019. He lost his re-election campaign to Nathan Hochman in November 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * LAPD Biography Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Cuban politicians Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Lawyers from San Francisco Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from San Francisco Category:People from Havana Category:American police officers Category:American progressives Category:District attorneys
title: George Gascón
